title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at One Sky Community Services (Portsmouth, NH)
Interview Descriptions: I came into the office and spoke to the manager/ hiring person. She was vert nice and asked a lot of "get to know you questions" and told me a little bit about the job in general, but told me each client was different so it would really depend on who I got placed with. It seemed to me they were in need of people right away and the processed was rushed to get me started right away. I did have to attend several hours of training .
Interview Questions: Do you have any nursing or home care experience?
